comment.author: 22575440@N07
comment._content: oh, I love this! Can you imagine how hot it would be to wear this much clothing in the Texas heat and in the days of no air conditioning!

comment.author: 15462050@N00
comment._content: She wears the habit of the Sisters of Mercy and the white veil of a novice. The photo was most likely made on the occasion of her receiving the habit.
